sec.title: Information about the rig
sec.p: The information about the rig shall include:

list-item.label: a)
list-item.p: names and web addresses, or a reference to a list, of authorized repair and service agents;

list-item.label: b)
list-item.p: the same information as on the data plate (see 6.4.1);

list-item.label: c)
list-item.p: a description of the operator's controls and directions of movements;

list-item.label: d)
list-item.p: an explanation of symbols used on operator panels and safety labels and other labels;

list-item.label: e)
list-item.p: a general view of the rig and its attachments;

list-item.label: f)
list-item.p: the necessary drawings, diagrams and illustrations, of sufficient size to be clear, showing the designation of major components, their functions, locations and relationships with the whole rig.
